author: smuzaffar
body: This fixes the lost dictionary definition errors we see in IBs (https://cmssdt.cern.ch/SDT/cgi-bin/showDupDict.py/el8_amd64_gcc12/www/fri/14.1-fri-11/CMSSW_14_1_X_2024-06-21-1100/testLogs/dupDict-lostDefs.log) and PR tests. New dictionaries were added via https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/45199/files but mapping was missing for these new dict in Utilities/ReleaseScripts/scripts/duplicateReflexLibrarySearch.py
title: Fix lost Dict Def: Add HcalRecHitSoA for HcalRecHit package
